lines.text: let them eat cake!
Hey, look, I want you to keep this, take that with you
[Hands Toad a twisted bolt]
That's from when my flywheel broke remember?
That's great, man, that's really great. Hey, you know what I'm going to do for you? I'm going to capture you a VC flag.
Naw, don't so that man, just come back alive.
Got my orders.
Yeah?
Leavin' tonight.
Where to?
Vietnam.
get the Toad in there.
You're gonna kick some ass, huh?
Kick ass, take names, and eat Kong for breakfast.
Give me your signature, champ.

[thinks it over for a moment]
Well, I'll tell you what. I'm not gonna sign it, but why don't you light it on fire and stick it up your ass?

[referring to the Toad]
Son of a bitch.
Who, what did you say, mayor?
I said it's sort of a beach.
[shouting]
We levelled it!
Maybe I could straighten up this place for you.
No thanks, I like this place just the way it is.
You like living in squalor?
You love me?
Hey, come on, does Raggedy Ann have cotton tits or what?
Do you know I used to know a surfer named Lance? His name was No Pants Lance.
Oh, come on, look at me, I'm a free man! The war is over, and I win!
Aw, come on, man, you got nothing better to do than hassle long-hairs?
That's my life, friend. I love my work.
Bobby, whatever you do, don't hit those trashcans!
Sir, I don't want to disappoint you, sir, but you've got yourself in with couple of cowards here. We like things safe and easy, understand?
I happen to think working as a topless dancer is creepy.
Well maybe that's your hangup, if you think the human body is creepy.
Debbie, you wanna stay away form weed. You know it's gonna lead you into cigarettes.
I got something in here that's gonna make you bigger than the topless grandmother of six. Think of that.
[opens suitcase]
Jesus Christ that's a snake!
Hey! It's the little twerp!
Don't little twerp me, John, I've grown.

[nods]
A little bit.
Now you git to it or I'll be talking to the major. This is his personal, favorite shithouse, you understand?
Andy, Andy, you don't think we'd be in Vietnam unless the President knew a few things we don't know, huh?
Not so loud, you're embarrassing me.
Hey Toad, I've been thinking. I'm taking care of you, right?
Yeah.
Now when we get back home, I'm gonna make you an honorary, full fledged member of the Pharaoh's, no blood handshakes, nothing like that.

[Toad claps his hands]
Then me and you and them, we're gonna open up a... a used car lot. You sell 'em, we steal 'em.

[being frisked by a police officer]
I want you to know you're facing false arrest charges.

[turns to face the cop]
What's your badge number?
Turn around!
I got it! I saw it, you're gonna hear from my attorney.
